articles.title: As Trump’s new travel ban begins, some visitors report extra scrutiny at U.S. airports - PBS
articles.description: President Donald Trump's new ban on travel to the U.S. by citizens from a dozen countries took effect Monday with relative calm, as some travelers with valid visas reported extra scrutiny at American airports before being allowed entry.
articles.content: MIAMI (AP) President Donald Trump’s new ban on travel to the U.S. by citizens from a dozen countries took effect Monday with relative calm, as some travelers with valid visas reported extra scrutiny … [+5138 chars]
